ğŸ Home PhD projects: Advisor: Dr. Gavin Conant Polyploidy and plant genome evolution I am studying the molecular evolution of post-polyploidization Brassica species including B. rapa, B. olecarea and B. napus. Status: data analysis Papers: Emery et al. 2018. Preferential retention of genes from one parental genome after polyploidy illustrates the nature and scope of the genomic conflicts induced by hybridization. PLoS Genet 14(3):e1007267 Hao et al. 2018. Patterns of population variation in two paleopolyploid eudicot lineages suggest that dosage-based selection on homeologs is long-lived.
